name: tiptoi Manager
description: tiptoiÂ® is an interactive learning system for small children from 4 to 10. For adding new books and games easily, this tool is provided for extending this electronic toy.
content:
files:
- windows_installer: http://static.tiptoi.com/software/windows/install.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing tiptoi-Manager
    executable: windows_installer
    name: wine.wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
